_sText:
hey
This is my setting how to pick up stuff on pres enter like hl2. I dont use gun to parent player.

Player attachaments points 

1. grenade0
1. grenade1
1. grenade2
1. grenade3
1. pistol
1. primary
1. eholster
1. c4 (T)
1. lfoot
1. rfoot
1. muzzle_flash
1. defusekit (ct)

This prefab is for multi key to open doors. you grab the ligt pres enter and take it to light target and the door will open. I made this very simple so people anderstand my setting, you can make fun maps with this setting. It will be fun to make puzzle map with egyt texture http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/3025

*You can change the func_movelinear to some func_physbox ore prop_dinamic and use the model you like. Use your fantasy =)

If you want change the settingt i can help you and tel me if you finde some bug =)

And this website is very good to make maps    http://www.hirstarts.com/molds/molds.html

have fun
